analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xa2639c691ba2c6136fb59b4320bfba655f35c17f.sol:
	Contract EBDCMedicinalCannabisToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2639c691ba2c6136fb59b4320bfba655f35c17f.sol#199-200)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2639c691ba2c6136fb59b4320bfba655f35c17f.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
